title: brand_configuration_management_api_crud_operations
description: Test the full CRUD operations of the Brand Configuration Management API including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting brand profiles with validation of tone of voice, colors, logo, and platform history.

title: research_job_management_api_crud_and_event_triggering
description: Verify the Research Job Management API supports creating, listing, retrieving, and polling research jobs, and that creating a research job triggers the Inngest deep.research.requested event with checkpointing and realtime streaming.

title: content_management_api_crud_operations
description: Validate the Content Management API endpoints for listing and creating content items generated by agents, ensuring proper validation and persistence.

title: publishing_queue_api_crud_and_retry_logic
description: Test the Publishing Queue API for listing and creating publishing queue items, including verifying retry logic for failed publishing attempts.

title: typescript_type_definitions_and_zod_schema_validation
description: Ensure all TypeScript type definitions and Zod schemas for domain models and Inngest event payloads validate correctly, including success and failure cases for DeepResearchRequestSchema and CreateBrandSchema.

title: inngest_deep_research_orchestrator_functionality
description: Test the Inngest deep.research.requested orchestrator function for correct checkpointing, realtime streaming updates, and job persistence during multi-step research workflows.

title: automated_testing_infrastructure_functionality
description: Verify the Jest and Playwright testing infrastructure runs successfully with coverage thresholds met, including mock utilities for Prisma and Inngest and standardized fixtures.

title: api_routes_validation_and_error_handling
description: Test all API routes for strict validation of inputs and outputs, ensuring appropriate HTTP status codes and consistent error handling across all endpoints.

title: frontend_integration_with_api_and_event_orchestration
description: Validate the integration flow between frontend React components (BrandForm, ResearchForm, ResearchStatus, ResearchReport), API routes, and backend Inngest event orchestration to ensure seamless user experience.

title: realtime_streaming_and_event_driven_updates
description: Test the Inngest realtime channels and middleware integration for delivering live progress updates streamed to the UI without polling, ensuring event-driven capabilities function correctly.
